title: Preseason bugs LUL (in game)

replies.body: Its now ok but imagine waiting 3 hour and half till that ( in game ) state ends even that match -with Nasus- isn't in my match histroy actually i posted the same post on EUNE board thinking this was EUNE so maybe they solve that

I'm not seeing any server issues right now, but it sounds like your connection is struggling to reach the game server.  I recommend going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot any snags, and test it in a custom game.

If the issue persist, run a traceroute so we can see where the hiccup is coming from.  Do this by downloading [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and routing to EUNE game server: 31.186.224.42.  Run it for about 5 minutes, remove the IP on the first two rows, and let me know what you find.
